review: I wanted to take a moment to express my heartfelt gratitude for the exceptional care you provided to my mother during her recent treatment for mental health issues. Your skill, expertise, and compassionate approach made all the difference in her recovery.From the moment we first met you, we knew we were in good hands. You took the time to listen carefully to my mother's concerns and needs, and you approached her treatment with the utmost care and attention to detail. Your knowledge and experience in the field of psychiatry were evident in every aspect of her care, and we felt confident that she was receiving the best possible treatment.As a result of your efforts, my mother has made remarkable progress in her mental health. She is happier, more confident, and more engaged with life than she has been in years. We are so grateful to you for the role you played in her recovery, and we will always be thankful for the exceptional care you provided.Thank you again for everything you have done for my mother and our family. You are truly an outstanding doctor and a wonderful human being.

Thank you so much for taking so much of your time and listening to what I had to say, thank you for your advices . I feel much better after the session. I have had consultations with other doctors before but no one took time to go so deep into the problem. Thank you

The doctor addressed each of my concerns very attentively and suggested remedies to be practiced on a day to day basis alongside taking the medication. I felt much better mentally and physically soon after the session.  It was a very good consultation experience.
very nice and understanding doctor.Understands the problem gave too much time in understanding my problem
